page.title: 04Shopping
page.content: We are trying to find out what services come into the village that people use.Some of the services the people use they depend on like the coalman,milkman,breadman and mobile shop.Some of the older villagers don't have any form of transport so they depend on the bus services to go out and go shopping(because the mobile shop doesn't have a wide variety of food,soaps and things that are used around the house).The breadman comes on a Monday and Friday.The milkman comes on Mondays,Wednesday and Fridays.The mobile library comes every Friday.The coalman comes once a week.The home help person goes to a few houses once a week.The bus service comes every Monday and Friday.The school bus picks up the children who go to Hatton school and takes them home from Monday to Friday.
